languages.text: "Думаешь — зачем я вообще тебе все это говорю? Наверное, переняла привычку людей болтать без умолку". {n}Ирлиэт негромко усмехается, но взгляд ее вдруг становится серьезным и проницательным.{/n} "Я здесь, чтобы сказать тебе, {name}... Я ни о чем не жалею. Ни о встрече с тобой, ни о том, что случилось с моим камнем душ. О том, насколько богаче и ярче стала моя душа рядом с тобой, известно лишь звездам".

"You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."
languages.original_text: "Думаешь — зачем я вообще тебе все это говорю? Наверное, переняла привычку людей болтать без умолку". {n}Ирлиэт негромко усмехается, но взгляд ее вдруг становится серьезным и проницательным.{/n} "Я здесь, чтобы сказать тебе, {name}... Я ни о чем не жалею. Ни о встрече с тобой, ни о том, что случилось с моим камнем душ. О том, насколько богаче и ярче стала моя душа рядом с тобой, известно лишь звездам".

traits.locale_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? Probably the humans' habit of talking endlessly has rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I'm here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. Only the stars know how richer and deeper my soul has become after meeting you."

"You think — why am I even saying all this to you? Probably the humans' habit of talking endlessly has rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I'm here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. Only the stars know how richer and deeper my soul has become after meeting you."

"You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

"You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

"You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

languages.text: “你可能在想，我为什么要对你说这些？看来，我也染上了你们人类说起话来没完没了的坏习惯。”{n}伊莉耶特发出一声轻笑，但她的目光突然变得严肃而锐利。{/n}“{name}，我想对你说的是……我并不后悔。我不后悔遇见你，也不后悔发生在灵魂石上的一切。群星见证，自我们相遇以来，我的灵魂变得比过去更丰沛、更深邃。”
languages.original_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

traits.locale_text: “你可能在想，我为什么要对你说这些？看来，我也染上了你们人类说起话来没完没了的坏习惯。”{n}伊莉耶特发出一声轻笑，但她的目光突然变得严肃而锐利。{/n}“{name}，我想对你说的是……我并不后悔。我不后悔遇见你，也不后悔发生在灵魂石上的一切。群星见证，自我们相遇以来，我的灵魂变得比过去更丰沛、更深邃。”

languages.text: «¿Crees que... por qué te estoy diciendo todo esto? Se me habrá pegado la costumbre humana de parlotear sin cesar». {n}Yrliet ríe entre dientes, pero su expresión se torna seria e intensa de repente.{/n} «He venido para decirte, {name}... que no me arrepiento de nada. Ni de conocerte, ni de lo que ha ocurrido con mi joya espiritual. Solo las estrellas saben lo mucho que se ha enriquecido y agrandado mi alma desde que te conocí».
languages.original_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

traits.locale_text: «¿Crees que... por qué te estoy diciendo todo esto? Se me habrá pegado la costumbre humana de parlotear sin cesar». {n}Yrliet ríe entre dientes, pero su expresión se torna seria e intensa de repente.{/n} «He venido para decirte, {name}... que no me arrepiento de nada. Ni de conocerte, ni de lo que ha ocurrido con mi joya espiritual. Solo las estrellas saben lo mucho que se ha enriquecido y agrandado mi alma desde que te conocí».

languages.text: « Vous devez vous demander pourquoi je vous dis tout cela. Je crois qu'à force de fréquenter des humains, j'ai adopté leur tendance à parler sans arrêt. » {n}Yrliet pousse un petit rire, mais son regard se fait soudain très sérieux et perçant.{/n} « Si je suis ici, {name}, c'est pour vous dire que... je n'ai aucun regret. Je ne regrette pas de vous avoir {mf|rencontré|rencontrée}, ni ce qui est arrivé à ma pierre-esprit. Seules les étoiles savent à quel point mon âme s'est enrichie depuis que j'ai fait votre connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez vous demander pourquoi je vous dis tout cela. Je crois qu'à force de fréquenter des humains, j'ai adopté leur tendance à parler sans arrêt. » {n}Yrliet pousse un petit rire, mais son regard se fait soudain très sérieux et perçant.{/n} « Si je suis ici, {name}, c'est pour vous dire que... je n'ai aucun regret. Je ne regrette pas de vous avoir {mf|rencontré|rencontrée}, ni ce qui est arrivé à ma pierre-esprit. Seules les étoiles savent à quel point mon âme s'est enrichie depuis que j'ai fait votre connaissance. »

languages.text: "Ihr fragt Euch sicher, warum ich Euch das alles überhaupt sage. Die menschliche Unart, pausenlos zu reden, muss auf mich abgefärbt haben." {n}Yrliet kichert leise, aber plötzlich wird ihr Blick ernst und durchdringend.{/n} "Ich bin hier, um Euch zu sagen, {name} ... dass ich nichts bedauere. Nicht, dass ich Euch getroffen habe, nicht, was mit meinem Seelenstein passiert ist. Nur die Sterne wissen, wie viel reicher und tiefer meine Seele geworden ist, seit ich Euch kenne."
languages.original_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr fragt Euch sicher, warum ich Euch das alles überhaupt sage. Die menschliche Unart, pausenlos zu reden, muss auf mich abgefärbt haben." {n}Yrliet kichert leise, aber plötzlich wird ihr Blick ernst und durchdringend.{/n} "Ich bin hier, um Euch zu sagen, {name} ... dass ich nichts bedauere. Nicht, dass ich Euch getroffen habe, nicht, was mit meinem Seelenstein passiert ist. Nur die Sterne wissen, wie viel reicher und tiefer meine Seele geworden ist, seit ich Euch kenne."

languages.text: 「不思議に思うだろう…なぜ私がこんなことを言うのかとな。延々としゃべり続ける人間の癖が移ったに違いない」{n}ユリエットは静かにほほ笑んだが、彼女の視線は急に真剣で鋭いものに変わった。{/n}「あなたに伝えに来たのだ、{name}…私は後悔していない。あなたに会ったことも、私の魂縛石に起こったことも。あなたと出会ってから、我が魂がどれほど豊かで深くなったかは、星々のみぞ知ることだ」
languages.original_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

traits.locale_text: 「不思議に思うだろう…なぜ私がこんなことを言うのかとな。延々としゃべり続ける人間の癖が移ったに違いない」{n}ユリエットは静かにほほ笑んだが、彼女の視線は急に真剣で鋭いものに変わった。{/n}「あなたに伝えに来たのだ、{name}…私は後悔していない。あなたに会ったことも、私の魂縛石に起こったことも。あなたと出会ってから、我が魂がどれほど豊かで深くなったかは、星々のみぞ知ることだ」

languages.original_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, ... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

languages.text: "Sana bunları neden söylediğimi merak ediyorsundur. İnsanların durmadan konuşma huyu bana da bulaşmış olmalı." {n}Yrliet, sessizce gülüyor ama bakışları aniden ciddi ve delici bir hâle bürünüyor.{/n} "Sana şunu söylemeye geldim {name}... Hiç pişmanlığım yok. Seninle tanışmaktan da ruh taşıma olanlardan da pişman değilim. Seninle tanıştığımdan beri ruhumun ne kadar zengin ve derin bir hâle geldiğini yıldızlar biliyor."
languages.original_text: "You think — why am I even saying all this to you? The human habit of talking endlessly must have rubbed off of me." {n}Yrliet chuckles quietly, but her gaze suddenly turns serious and piercing.{/n} "I am here to tell you, {name}... I have no regrets. Not about meeting you, not about what happened to my spirit stone. The stars alone know how much richer and deeper my soul has become since meeting you."

Hiç pişmanlığım yok. Seninle tanışmaktan da ruh taşıma olanlardan da pişman değilim. Seninle tanıştığımdan beri ruhumun ne kadar zengin ve derin bir hâle geldiğini yıldızlar biliyor."
